Body:
with TemporaryDirectory() as tmpdir:
    sh, gr = generic_compute_shaps(classifier=MODELS_PATH / trait_name /
        f'{trait_name}.xgb.pkl', fasta_files=list(GENOMIC_PATH.iterdir()),
        n_samples=50, verb=True, genotype=None)
    shap_summary_plot(sh=sh, n_max_features=20, out_summary_plot=Path(
        tmpdir) / 'plot.png', out_summary_txt=Path(tmpdir) / 'summary.txt',
        title='')
    assert (Path(tmpdir) / 'plot.png').is_file()
    assert (Path(tmpdir) / 'summary.txt').is_file()
pytest.mark.skipif(not FROM_FASTA, reason='Missing optional dependencies')
